intro.speaker: Jagen
intro.line: Sire, Lord Horace should be inside this fort.

intro.speaker: Kris
intro.line: It seems the enemy has already infiltrated the building. Please be careful, sire.

intro.speaker: Marth
intro.line: All right. Let us fight with caution.

intro.speaker: Legion
intro.line: Uwee hee hee... Horaces, was it? Youses a stubborn ones... Yous already killed three of our brotherses. But there are mores of us... moreses, moreses, moreses! How longs can you last? Uwee hee!

intro.speaker: Horace
intro.line: Who the hell are you? Who gave you the orders to attack me?

intro.speaker: Legion
intro.line: Uwee hee hee. Who knowses? We sure don't. But really, poor yous! You'll be killed by us, and won't even knows why!

intro.speaker: Horace
intro.line: My life isn't my own. Ever since I became a knight, my life is for my liege and my people. I cannot be defeated by cowards like you.

intro.speaker: Legion
intro.line: Uwee hee hee! Bring it on!! We are Legion. There are manys of us and ones of us, all in oneses. Want to knows how to defeats us, hmm? Simple. Just kills the real Legion. But can you findses the real Legion?! Uwee hee hee!!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Horace
recruit-talk.line: You are Kris, Prince Marth's Royal Guard, correct? 'Tis an honor to meet you. I am Horace, an Archanean knight in the service of Princess Nyna. Prince Marth saved me in the previous war. For Princess Nyna's sake, please allow me the privilege of fighting alongside you.

battle.speaker: Legion
battle.line: Uwee hee hee! You can kills us and kills us again. But there are mores of our brotherses... moreses, moreses, moreses of us! As longs as the real Legion is still standing, there'll be no end to the Legion... Uwee hee!!!

boss.speaker: Legion
boss.line: Uwee hee hee!!! Are we real or are we false? Try us and see!!!

boss.speaker: Legion
boss.line: Uwee hee... hee... how did you... know...?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Sire, the remaining enemies have fled. Victory is ours.

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: Good work. But either way, that was a strange enemy. Were they even human...?

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: I've heard rumors about them. Those wicked assassins crushed their souls when they were young, and raised them as living puppets who follow orders without question...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: How pitiful... Kris. I wonder if Katarina was raised under such circumstances, as well...

end.speaker: Marth
end.line: However, we can't do anything about that now. Let us go ahead. To Anri's Way, where Lord Gotoh awaits.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Sir Jagen, I've found something most odd inside the castle. It's this mask. It seems like a different type from the one those assassins wore, but what's it for...?

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Heh... This is a mask for use in a masquerade ball, I believe.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Masquerade ball?

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Yes. Noblemen once donned these masks in order to conceal their identities. They were probably used in this old castle a long time ago. So, it's unrelated to the assassins.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: I see... But, it sure is a strange mask.

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: What of it? Don't tell me you intend to wear it?

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: Yes. For some reason, I feel like giving it a try.

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: You are an odd one. Well, do as you wish.

end.speaker: Kris
end.line: No, I'll leave it where I found it.

end.speaker: Jagen
end.line: Yes, good idea.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Lady Eremiya... I have a report. Legion, he...

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: I see, so he failed. Even though I took such good care of him... Such a troublesome child.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Lady Eremiya, the Altean army is strong. Now that Legion has been defeated... Perhaps we should refrain from pursuing them.

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: No. Crushing Altea was an order of his.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: But...

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: What? Reese, don't tell me you're afraid?

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Clarisse...

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Lady Eremiya, please allow me the honor. I'll take care of them.

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: My, you're a good girl, Clarisse. Would you?

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Anything for you, Lady Eremiya.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: ... Lady Eremiya, about the remaining Legion brothers...

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: Ah, those. Get rid of all of them.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: Lady Eremiya...!

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: They can't fight now that they've lost Legion, can they? So, they're useless now. Broken junk is to be discarded.

end.speaker: Katarina
end.line: B-but, Lady Eremiya... They were with us in the orphanage... with you too, Lady Eremiya...

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: So what?

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Reese, you sure are useless, aren't you? Don't worry, Lady Eremiya. I'll get rid of them.

end.speaker: Eremiya
end.line: My, Clarisse is such a good little girl. Completely different from a certain failure.

end.speaker: Clarisse
end.line: Ah, Lady Eremiya... Your praise makes me happy.
